'''Unexpectedly Adopted Fantastic Feline''' is a quest reward from the {{Quest|Sir Pouncelot Joins the Lot!}}.

Once obtained, it is automatically exchanged for the similar [[Sir Pouncelot (Furnishing)|Sir Pouncelot]] furnishing.
